definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[גׇּֽבְּלוּ]] De 19:14; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִגְבּוֹל]] Jos 18:20, 3 fs. [[תִּגְבָּל־]] Zec 9:2; —bound, border, c. acc. Jos 18:20 (P); c. [[בְּ]] border upon, adjoin Zec 9:2; trans. set bounds De 10:14 (c. acc. cogn.).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. set bounds for, c. acc. [[וְהִגְבַּלְתָּ֫]] Ex 19:12; Imv. id. [[הַגְבֵּל]] v:Ex 19:23 (both JE), + Pt. [[מַגְבִּיל]] Ez Eze 47:18 LXX SyrVer Vulgate Co.
